name: BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.stopNotifications
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.stopNotifications() method returns a Promise to the BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic instance when there is no longer an active notification on it.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

TheBluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.stopNotifications()method returns a Promise to theBluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic instancewhen there is no longer an active notification on it.
